about.title: Welcome to L2Jade!
about.description: We are pleased to announce the launch of L2Jade, our new Lineage 2 server, meticulously designed to offer the ultimate experience of this iconic MMORPG. Our goal is to provide a balanced, challenging, and exciting environment where players can relive the glory of Lineage 2 and forge new legends.

stability.title: Stability
stability.description: Experience a robust and reliable gaming environment with our high-performance servers

anticheat.title: Anticheat
anticheat.description: Advanced protection systems ensuring fair play for all players

competition.title: Competition
competition.description: Engage in thrilling PvP battles and compete for epic rewards

noP2W.title: No P2W
noP2W.description: Equal opportunities for all players, success based on skill and dedication

information.title: Game Information
information.description: Everything you need to know about our Lineage II server

general.title: General Information
items: Stuck Sub main +1 (3rd Class in one)
Gm Shop up to S grade (A/S Mid-Farm)
Automatic drop collection except for Raids
Divine Inspiration: For sale in the Shop
Noblesse Status (Caradine letter lvl 75 for sale)
Self-manageable Race and Gender Appearance Changes by Community (Alt + B)
Reward for individual votes in different web rankings

questSystem.title: Quest System
questSystem.description: Most quests reward Donate Coins as an alternative way to obtain these coins. These quests involve killing Mobs, Raids, Enchanting, Augmenting, and others.

enchants.title: Enchants
items: Jade Scroll 10% (Maintains the enchant if it fails)

augments.title: Augments
items: Only one Augment can be used

olympiads.title: Olympiads
items: Hero status is obtained only through Olympiads
Olympiad Days: Tuesday and Thursday (Heroes will be awarded on Fridays at 12 pm)
Times: Starts at 22:00 and ends at 00:00 (GMT-3)
Retail Olympiads (No buffs and no potions)
Requirement to become a hero: 9 minimum fights, at least 1 won and be first in the ranking

sieges.title: Sieges
items: Benefits for all clan members upon obtaining a castle: Passive Siege Skill
Exclusive castles for events with cash prizes

clans.title: Clans
items: Royal Guard and Knight Guard Enabled
It is not allowed to create alliances with other clans
Full level clan and accessible skills

raidBosses.title: Raid Boss Respawn Time
items: Barakiel: Every day at 21:00 hs (Noblesse all party - last hit)
Anakim/Lilith: Every day at 15:00 and 23:00 hs (Special Raids for Evolution System)
raidBosses.note: The epic bosses on Fridays alternate at the same time, meaning one Friday is Zaken and the next is Queen Ant. The same applies to Core and Orfen.

varkaSilenos.title: Varka's Silenos
drops: Letters: L I N E A G E 2 J A D E

pvpFarm.title: Farm PvP (Rotating zones every 2 hours)
drops: Letters: L I N E A G E 2 J A D E

items.title: Rule 1: Respect and Conduct
items.content: Respect is established as a fundamental principle in the framework of the relationships given on this server (player and player, player and GM/administrators). The purpose of this server is entertainment and enjoyment. Anyone who violates this regulation will be subject to a ban (temporary or permanent as appropriate) of an account.

items.title: Rule 2: Reporting Bugs
items.content: The server content has been tested for the most part, but as is publicly known, this game is immeasurable, as well as its possibilities. It will be the player's duty to report any bugs they find, thus the administration commits to fixing the other defects and irregularities detected, understanding it as essential to achieve a potentially perfect server.

items.title: Rule 3: Inappropriate Names
items.content: We reserve the right to request a player to change their name and/or title if it is considered inappropriate/offensive/reserved for GMS, etc. The character will be notified and allowed to choose a new name at no charge and no further action will be taken. If the player refuses to cooperate, the staff may change the character's name at their own discretion, as well as apply the corresponding punishment.

items.title: Rule 4: Item Sales
items.content: The sale of any item from this game for legal tender is prohibited, if done so, the ban of both subjects (SELLER AND BUYER) will be carried out.

items.title: Rule 5: SPAM and Advertising
items.content: SPAM from other servers in the game will result in a permanent ban of the player's account.

items.title: Rule 6: Account Responsibility
items.content: User data (accuracy and maintenance) is their sole responsibility. It is their duty to take care of and keep them updated (email in case of password loss). The administration is not responsible for forgotten, lost, deleted, or canceled data for any reason.

items.title: Rule 7: Donations
items.content: What is given as a donation will not be returned, it will be used in its entirety for improvements and maintenance of the game.

items.title: Rule 8: Anti-Game Actions
items.content: Actions that the administration deems anti-game (inappropriate or bad actions) will be subject to punishment, understood as: intentionally losing in the Grand Olympiad to give points to another character; interrupting or attempting to deceive automatic or administration-made events; Trying to deceive other players by offering fake items.

items.title: Rule 9: External Programs
items.content: The external use of programs that interact with the game is strictly prohibited. For example, those used with the intention of using bots, auto farmer. Reports for these cases are open, attaching evidence, character name, the staff will sanction the same.

items.title: Rule 10: Administration Responsibility
items.content: The administration and GMs are not responsible for loss of items, skills, etc., for any reason, whether server crashes or restarts, system errors, bugs, invasions, rollbacks, and/or user mishandling.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Get everything you need to start your adventure in the world of Lineage II

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or need assistance? Reach out to our support team
